refnamediv.refpurpose: Accesses table values at a user-defined frequency.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Accesses table values at a user-defined frequency. This opcode can also be written as oscilx.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.synopsis: ares osciln kamp, ifrq, ifn, itimes

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifrq, itimes -- rate and number of times through the stored table.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: osciln will sample several times through the stored table at a rate of ifrq times per second, after which it will output zeros. Generates audio signals only, with output values scaled by kamp.
